price: Na sifa njema zote ni za Mwenyezi Mungu Mola Mlezi wa walimwengu wote.
footnotes: Na sifa njema ni za Mwenyezi Mungu peke yake, Muumba wa viumbe vyote, na Mwenye kuwaangalia makhaluku wote.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
